text: Thomas Cresswell Lace (born 27 May 1998) is an English cricketer. Lace came through the youth setup at Middlesex. He spent two seasons on loan with Derbyshire, making his first-class debut for them in the 2018 County Championship on 29 August 2018, and his List A debut on 19 April 2019, in the 2019 Royal London One-Day Cup. Having scored 835 runs, including three centuries, at an average of 43.33 in the County Championship for Derbyshire in 2019, Lace returned to Middlesex where he signed a new contract to keep him at the club through the 2022 season. In August 2020, he joined Gloucestershire, after Middlesex agreed to let him go. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Derbyshire cricketers Category:Gloucestershire cricketers Category:Middlesex cricketers Category:People from Hammersmith
title: Tom Lace
